title: Episode 160: Happy Birthday, Captain
itunes:title: Episode 160: Happy Birthday, Captain
description:
With a little help from friends, Gilbo, Koloko, and PinkDick attempt to turn their captain’s birthday frown upside down. We talk ligament cakes, a Brazilian body spray, and a Frank Sinatra moment.

Premium Episodes every Monday.

https://www.patreon.com/TigerBelly

Sponsor Links:

https://www.ridgewallet.com Promo Code: TIGERBELLY
